data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Bordj Bou Arréridj. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bordj Bou Arréridj, Algeria
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Bordj Bou Arréridj, Algeria.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 543,884 who are far from you in Bordj Bou Arréridj, Algeria from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Bordj Bou Arréridj, Algeria to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bedouin, Nail people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Bordj Bou Arréridj, Algeria.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 543,929 people in Bordj Bou Arréridj who are far from you. Please add 108 new house churches this year.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bordj Bou Arréridj, Algeria has a population of 544,300.

We estimate Bordj Bou Arréridj has 371 people who might know Jesus, 45 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 543,884 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1,467 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 371 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
